Text: I am a big fan of Sierra.  Currently having a friend translate my VHS copy of Slave To Love into a file in which I can share here.  If anyone else has any more Sierra movies to share, I would very much appreciate it.
is the soundquality any good? i mean the audio bit rate, kbps?..  i just love the andrew blake soundtracks.. i was thinking of ripping it so i would appreciate if somebody could help with this
